title: Region defined by hor. line and quartic function part - c

content.description: Let R be the region enclosed by the graph of f(x)=x4-2.3x3+4 and the horizontal line y=4, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: The vertical line x=k divides R into two regions with equal areas. Write, but do not solve, an equation involving integral expressions whose solution gives the value k.

frqParts.text: The vertical line x=k divides R into two regions with equal areas. Write, but do not solve, an equation involving integral expressions whose solution gives the value k.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Use appropriate mathematical symbols and notation (e.g., Represent a derivative using Æ’'(x), y', and dy/dx).
